messages.subject: Ersatz school
messages.msgSnippet: We recenlty read The Ersatz Elevator by Lemony Snicket.  Tonight we were talking about different things we could name our *school* (we have to pick a name
messages.messageBody:
We recenlty read "The Ersatz Elevator" by Lemony Snicket. Tonight we were
talking about different things we could name our *school* (we have to pick a
name for the state and we already have one for this year, but anyway) and
Leigh (8) said we could name it The Ersatz School! One meaning of ersatz is
imitation. (although our *school* is certainly not an inferior imitation!)
I thought that was a great idea. Ah, the joy of books!


Angela in Maine-unschooling@...
http://userpages.prexar.com/rickshaw/

"What you are shouts so loudly in my ears I cannot hear what you say."
Emerson
